title: 08 perches solid build brand new house for sale in Kalalgoda at Thalawatugoda
details:
Dear Sir /Madam.

please find the property details.

Brand new luxury house 08 perches 600 meters to main road at kalalgoda at Thalawatugoda.

04 beds with attached bath rooms, living, dining, pantry, kitchen, TV lobby, courtyard, A/C rooms etc..,

Parking for 2 vehicles with roller shutters, maids room with attached bath. 2900 sqf,

Highly residential area. 20 foot road acces

Price. 28 million. Negotiate

Please call for more details

Regards
Dilan
